oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bragg's Headquarters, Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of a section of Missionary Ridge known as General Bragg's Headquarters. A road leads to monuments and a tower surrounded by trees. Features a bottom white border and an undivided back. There is handwritten correspondence on both sides and June 1906 and July 1906 postmarks. [No. 102]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Towers; Trees
